name: Guarded Attack
shortContent: -10 WS to your attack but +10 to Dodge and Parry until your next turn.
content:
The character performs a careful attack, making sure he
remains well poised to defend himself. The character suffers
a –10 penalty to his Weapon Skill Test, but he gains a +10
bonus to all Dodge and Parry Tests until the start of his
next Turn.
